widget.name: Quick RPG Dice
widget.description:
A powerful yet easy to use dice roller.
This was created out of a need to have a useful and fast dice roller that had a set of features I didn't see in any other dice rollers in the storefront.
* Up to 10 dice can be rolled at time * Dice with 2, 4, 6, 8, 10, 12, 20, and 100 sides * A single screen with no complex config menus * Lightning fast - sorry but 3d dice are too slow * Relyably random - uses well tested system libriaries for random number generation rather than some custom poorly tested physics model. * A ticker so you can see the entire roll history since the app started
widget.author: Robert Kohr
